Description: TapStack - Complete secure multi-environment infrastructure with observability and auto-remediation (no prompts, lint-cleaned)

EnvironmentName.Description: Environment name for resource sizing and configuration

ProjectName.Description: Lowercase project slug used in tags and names (must be lowercase for DNS)

AllowedAdminCidr.Description: CIDR block allowed for SSH admin access (kept for future; SSM used instead)

AlarmEmail.Description: Email address for CloudWatch alarm notifications

LatestAmiId.Description: SSM path for latest Amazon Linux 2023 AMI

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for bastion host (SSM access; SSH optional)

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: SSH access from admin CIDR (optional; use SSM primarily)

UserData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash
set -e
dnf -y update || yum -y update
dnf -y install amazon-cloudwatch-agent || yum -y install amazon-cloudwatch-agent
/opt/aws/amazon-cloudwatch-agent/bin/amazon-cloudwatch-agent-ctl \
  -a fetch-config -m ec2 -s -c default

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alarm when EC2 CPU exceeds threshold

Properties.Description: Trigger on S3 bucket policy changes

BastionPublicDnsName.Description: Bastion EC2 Instance Public DNS Name

S3PolicyGuardFunctionName.Description: S3 Policy Guard Lambda Function Name

S3PolicyGuardFunctionArn.Description: S3 Policy Guard Lambda Function ARN
